docs.text: Home qanda is a simple Q&A site generated by MkDocs .

docs.text: qanda is a simple Q&A site generated by MkDocs .
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Update qanda 1 Setup, edit, push and build Prerequisite (Python should be installed already): pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material pygments Start the live-reloading docs server locally: mkdocs serve Edit docs/*.md as you want. And commit and push it. Build: mkdocs build 2 Deploy gh pages
docs.title: Update qanda

docs.text: Prerequisite (Python should be installed already): pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material pygments Start the live-reloading docs server locally: mkdocs serve Edit docs/*.md as you want. And commit and push it. Build: mkdocs build
